title: Will We See KD In Nets Camp?
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by Andscape’s Marc J. Spears to break down what is next for the Nets and Kevin Durant, including if they think he will be at Brooklyn’s training camp. Plus, the guys share their thoughts on throwback jerseys and discuss what you learn from NBA practices.
